Producer: Daniela Taplin Lundberg, Riva Marker, Nicole Kidman, Per Saari, Leslie Urdang, Dean Vanech, Jason Bateman, James Garavente
Production Co: QED International, Olympus Pictures, Aggregate Films, Blossom Films, Red Crown Productions, Papagjika Salloway Productions
Synopsis: An actress (Nicole Kidman) and her brother (Jason Bateman) investigate the mysterious disappearance of their parents, two performance artists known for their elaborate hoaxes.
Title: The Family Fang
